effect.traveloptics.abyssal_strike.descr: Attacks have a chance to spread the Abyssal Curse effect to nearby entities.
effect.traveloptics.aerial_collapse.desc: Causes the affected entity to fly and crash down, dealing percentage-based damage to their health, ignoring armor.
effect.traveloptics.aptrgangr_timer.desc: Controls despawn time for summoned entities.
Causes the affected entity to hover at a specific Y level based on the amplifier.
effect.traveloptics.assassin.description: Grants true invisibility, greatly increases movement speed and attack damage. The effect is removed after the first attack.
effect.traveloptics.astral_sense.descrip: Alert the player about incoming projectiles, targeting and approaching entities.
effect.traveloptics.astral_sense_treasur: Helps the player to find chests, traps, and valuable blocks.
effect.traveloptics.atlatitan_timer.desc: Controls despawn time for summoned entities.
effect.traveloptics.berserk.description: Increases critical hit rate and damage.
effect.traveloptics.blackout.description: Affected get their magic suppressed for the entire duration, they can melee attack.
effect.traveloptics.corroded.description: Reduces resistance to fire spells and corrodes armor.
effect.traveloptics.cursed_revenants_tim: Controls despawn time for summoned entities.
effect.traveloptics.desert_dweller_timer: Controls despawn time for summoned entities.
effect.traveloptics.ender_golem_timer.de: Controls despawn time for summoned entities.
effect.traveloptics.flare_vacuum.descrip: Pulls in nearby entities with a fiery vacuum effect before bursting into flame jets.
effect.traveloptics.floodgate.descriptio: Imposes a damage cap on the caster, ensuring that any incoming damage exceeding the threshold is reduced to the cap. When damage surpasses the threshold, waves surge outward in all directions, dealing damage.
effect.traveloptics.forsaken_timer.descr: Controls despawn time for summoned entities.
effect.traveloptics.frozen_sight.descrip: Fixes the entity’s vision at the point they were looking when the effect took hold. Also disables certain player abilities.
effect.traveloptics.gum_worm_timer.descr: Controls despawn time for summoned entities.
effect.traveloptics.hullbreaker_timer.de: Controls despawn time for summoned entities.
effect.traveloptics.ignited_onslaught_ti: Controls despawn time for summoned entities.
effect.traveloptics.jet_steam.descriptio: Significantly boosts elytra flight and swimming speed.
effect.traveloptics.kobolediator_timer.d: Controls despawn time for summoned entities.
effect.traveloptics.lingering_strain.des: Splits incoming burst damage into four parts, dealt over 8 seconds instead of instantly.
effect.traveloptics.magnetron_timer.desc: Controls despawn time for summoned entities.
effect.traveloptics.mechanized_predator_: Controls despawn time for summoned entities.
effect.traveloptics.meteor_storm.descrip: Summons Ignis fireballs to rain down from the sky. If the caster's health falls below 50%, the fireballs transform into soul-fired projectiles.
effect.traveloptics.nullflare_fire.descr: Deals damage-over-time to the affected entity.
effect.traveloptics.nullflare_ice.descri: Slows and chills the affected entity.
effect.traveloptics.orbital_tornado.desc: (WIP Effect) Causes nearby entities to orbit the affected entity like a tornado.
effect.traveloptics.orbital_void.descrip: Spawns Abyssal orbs around the affected entity every 3 sec.
effect.traveloptics.phantom_rage.descrip: Increases Attack damage, Spell power, Arrow damage.
effect.traveloptics.primal_pack_timer.de: Controls despawn time for summoned entities.
effect.traveloptics.replenish.descriptio: Adds mana regeneration to the affected entity.
effect.traveloptics.reversal.description: Reverses any incoming damage. Additionally, it can copy incoming projectiles.
effect.traveloptics.spectral_blink.descr: After 3 seconds, teleports the affected entity to the entity they were looking at, passing through any blocks.
effect.traveloptics.spectral_blink.misse: Spectral Blink failed: No entities detected in the range
effect.traveloptics.spirit_damage_helper: A helper effect to simulate scaling damage on Dinosaur Spirits.
effect.traveloptics.sunstrike.descriptio: Continuously strikes nearby entities with Sunstrike.
Forces the affected player to switch to third person perspective. Switches back to first person when effect ends.
effect.traveloptics.tidal_grasp.descript: Helper effects for Tidal grasp spell.
effect.traveloptics.tidal_grasp_helper.d: Helper effects for Tidal grasp spell.
effect.traveloptics.tidal_slash.descript: While wielding the Trident of the Eternal Maelstrom in your main hand, your normal attacks unleash Tidal Slash projectiles.
effect.traveloptics.vesper_timer.descrip: Controls despawn time for summoned entities.
effect.traveloptics.vigor_siphon.descrip: While affected, Damage dealt by the summon heals you, and your damage heals the summon in return. If you die while tethered, the linked summon is sacrificed to restore you with 8hp
effect.traveloptics.void_tome_timer.desc: Controls despawn time for summoned entities.
effect.traveloptics.vortex_punch.descrip: Helper effect for Vortex Uppercut spell.
effect.traveloptics.wet.description: Reduces resistance to ice and lightning spells.
entity.traveloptics.aqua_grandmaster.tra: A fine addition to my collection!
Interesting... I’ve not seen one like this before!
You understand the value of true rarity. I appreciate that!
The ocean thanks you, as do I!
The sea has its secrets… this may be one of them!
Every item has a story. I’ll make sure this one is remembered!
I don’t do business when the sun is up. Wait for the night!
The morning is for peace, not trading. Return when the stars shine!
Let me enjoy the waves... Come back at night!
Not now. The tide is all I need this morning!
Find me when the night falls, not under the sun!
entity.traveloptics.fading_mage.dialogue: I began to learn. Alone. In silence.   §6[Right-Click]
I tried to prove it could come back.   §6[Right-Click]
Magic had cost. But so did silence!   §6[Right-Click]
What was taken cannot be replaced.   §6[Right-Click]
But maybe... someone else can find what I couldn’t...   §6[Right-Click]
Not because magic faded… but because they were told it had.   §6[Right-Click]
A world run by metal and logic leaves no room for dreams.   §6[Right-Click]
They laughed when I said magic was still here.   §6[Right-Click]
Some truths aren’t forgotten... they’re buried.   §6[Right-Click]
entity.traveloptics.message.defeated_coo: It's not responding, something feels off...
entity.traveloptics.message.defeated_no_: You need Excrucis to start the ritual!
entity.traveloptics.message.defeated_not: It doesn't seem to noticed you!
The Nightwarden is vulnerable to§6 Counterspell§c when Resurgence meter is full!
Nightwarden again becomes vulnerable to §6magic§c, but highly resistant to §6melee §cdamage!
Nightwarden becomes vulnerable to both §6magic§c and §6melee!
§6Watch for the shift in light! §cCounterspell §6at the right moment...
And shifts into a melee combat stance!
entity.traveloptics.message.nightwarden_: Every adaptation fades from the Nightwarden!
Adaptation Cleared: %s! and The Nightwarden sends out an anti-magic surge...
The Nightwarden shrugs off the attack!
The Nightwarden has returned to his home!
The Nightwarden has started his return home sequence...

item.traveloptics.immense_pain_spike.des: It looks like you can start a ritual to save someone...
item.traveloptics.immense_pain_spike.shi: [Press SHIFT to reveal tips. This might be spoiler for some]
item.traveloptics.immense_pain_spike.too: A well-timed counterspell may be one of your way to turn the tide. Without it, the fight may unravel faster than you can recover.

His defenses change throughout the battle. At times, only melee attacks are effective (phase 2) — all other damage is heavily reduced. In other moments, elemental spells break through while physical strikes are ignored (phase 1 & 3). A message will be shown in action bar when this happens.
Spells like Teleport or Blink are highly recommended. They’re effective tools for dodging incoming attacks.

He grows resistant to elemental damage. Once fully adapted, he will take drastically reduced damage from that element. Physical attacks do not trigger this adaptation, but won’t always be effective either.
Make sure to be well prepared before starting the ritual.

Using the same damage type after he adapts to it or any non-melee attacks during his melee phase builds up his resurgence meter. When it’s full, a Counterspell must be cast on him to reset all adaptations, but it will also clear all effects from every entity nearby. The more it builds, the more bonus Lifesteal he gets for his melee attacks and bonus damage for his magic attacks.

Activating the weapon's transformation puts it into an overloaded state, canceling other transformations.

item.traveloptics.kyrexi_claws.guide: Can be obtained by killing Amethyst Crabs. Can be used to upgrade Thorns Of Oblivion weapon in a smithing table.
item.traveloptics.last_glow.desc: Crafting Item. Can also be used to upgrade weapons
item.traveloptics.last_glow.guide: A dying star. Can be obtained by defeating The Harbinger. Can be used for various crafting/upgrading recipes.
item.traveloptics.mechanized_exoskeleton: §eElytra Boost: §fWhile gliding, press §b[%s] §fto propel forward at high speed
§eJetpack Boost: §fPress §b[%s] §fto activate the jetpack and gain upward thrust
When wearing the full set, achieve high-speed jet propulsion, elytra-boosted flight, and an integrated weapon system. Fire rapid lasers or launch explosive missiles while soaring through the skies.
§fWhen fuel drops to §c1% §fwhile airborne, automatically consumes a §bTesla Bulb §fto restore up to §b50% §ffuel
item.traveloptics.mechanized_wraithblade: §e★ §f[Evo 3] Laser damage scales further with §bLightning Spell Power
§7☆ [Evo 3] Laser damage scales further with §3Lightning Spell Power
§e★ §f[Evo 2] Reduces bullet spread by §b0.05 §fand boosts velocity by §b0.8
§7☆ [Evo 2] Reduces bullet spread by §30.05 §7and boosts velocity by §30.8
Can  be obtained by fusion Laser Gatling and Cursed Wraithblade in a Fusion Anvil.

§fHold §bRight-click §fto fire a continuous laser beam powered by stored Plasma Core energy. §fEach strike generates §bPlasma Core§f, which acts as both ammunition and enhances the laser’s damage output

§fHold §bRight-click §fto fire a continuous laser beam powered by stored Plasma Core energy. §fEach strike generates §bPlasma Core§f, which acts as both ammunition and enhances the laser’s damage output. §fLaser damage is further increased by §bLightning Spell Power§f
When the Plasma Core reaches §c5§f, a §bPlasma Power Cell §fis automatically consumed to restore §b50% §fof its capacity
item.traveloptics.music_disc_169.guide: Has a chance of appearing in Aqua Grandmaster trade offers.
item.traveloptics.nightstalkers_band.gui: Can be found in Ancient City treasure chests.
item.traveloptics.nightstalkers_band.too: Reversal can now be cast without a weapon. Reflecting a projectile grants the Assassin effect for 5sec, boosting movement speed and greatly enhancing attack damage. The effect ends upon striking an entity
item.traveloptics.obsidian_bookshelf.gui: A very rare bookshelf. Can only be found in Void Cathedral treasure chests or can be traded with Fading Mage.
item.traveloptics.plasma_power_cell.desc: Can be used to refuel plasma mechanisms
item.traveloptics.pocket_black_hole.desc: A miniature black hole that draws in experience orbs naturally
item.traveloptics.pocket_black_hole.guid: Can be obtained from Void Cathedral treasure chests or can be traded with the Fading Mage
item.traveloptics.primordial_crest_armor: When wearing the full set, each time the wearer is hit, it triggers a shockwave that knocks back nearby entities and deals damage in a §b5-block §fradius. The damage is scaled by fire spell power. Can only occur once every §c20sec. §fLong-cast armor imbued spells will be interrupted when armor is on cooldown, imbue with an instant-cast spell.
Can be obtained by defeating Netherite Monstrosity.
item.traveloptics.random_imbue_curio.aqu: Imbued with an Aqua spell, the waters bend to your will.
§eRight-click §2to absorb the power of an Aqua spell!
item.traveloptics.random_imbue_curio.blo: Imbued with a Blood spell, your power is tied to the essence of life itself.
item.traveloptics.random_imbue_curio.eld: Imbued with an Eldritch spell, the ancient horrors of the void answer your call.
item.traveloptics.random_imbue_curio.end: Imbued with an Ender spell, the void and its mysteries are yours to manipulate.
item.traveloptics.random_imbue_curio.evo: With an Evocation spell imbued, the elements and spirits heed your call.
item.traveloptics.random_imbue_curio.fir: Imbued with a Fire spell, the fury of flames is now yours to unleash.
item.traveloptics.random_imbue_curio.hol: Imbued with a Holy spell, you are a beacon of divine protection and strength.
item.traveloptics.random_imbue_curio.ice: Imbued with an Ice spell, you wield the unyielding frost.
item.traveloptics.random_imbue_curio.lig: Imbued with a Lightning spell, the storm answers your command.
§eRight-click §2to charge it with a Lightning spell!
item.traveloptics.random_imbue_curio.nat: With a Nature spell imbued, the earth and its creatures respond to your call.
item.traveloptics.resonant_scrap.desc: Can be used to craft and recreate Elemental Echoes
item.traveloptics.resonant_scrap.guide: Obtained by smelting Elemental Echoes in a Blast Furnace.
item.traveloptics.scourge_of_the_sands.e: §e★ §f[Evo 1] Increases radius by §b+6 §fand max targets by §b+4
§7☆ [Evo 1] Increases radius by §3+6 §7and max targets by §3+4
§e★ §f[Evo 3] Both Manifestation damage is now scaled with §bHoly Spell power
§7☆ [Evo 3] Both Manifestation damage is now scaled with §3Holy Spell power
item.traveloptics.scourge_of_the_sands.g: A rare drop from the Ancient Remnant.
item.traveloptics.scourge_of_the_sands.t: §fHold right-click to charge. When released, it summons an Ancient Desert Stele on top of all enemies' heads within a §b12-block §fradius. §fCrushing down and dealing damage. Max §b6 §ftargets
§fHold right-click to charge. When released, it summons an Ancient Desert Stele on top of all enemies' heads within a §b18-block §fradius. §fCrushing down and dealing damage. Max §b10 §ftargets
§fHold right-click to charge. When released, it summons an Ancient Desert Stele on top of all enemies' heads within a §b18-block §fradius. §fCrushing down and dealing damage. Max §b10 §ftargets

§fHold right-click to charge. When released, it summons an Ancient Desert Stele on top of all enemies' heads within a §b18-block §fradius. §fCrushing down and dealing damage. Max §b10 §ftargets. Damage increases with §bHoly Spell Power

§fHold right-click to charge. When released, it conjures two raging Sandstorms that orbit around the caster, lasting §b10sec§f. Any entity that comes into contact with the storm takes damage over time

§fHold right-click to charge. When released, it conjures two raging Sandstorms that orbit around the caster, lasting §b10sec§f. Any entity that comes into contact with the storm takes damage over time. Damage increases with §bHoly Spell Power
item.traveloptics.shattered_hydrocharge_: Can be found in Acropolis structure's treasure chests.
item.traveloptics.sigil_of_the_spider_so: Spell Talent: Aspect Of The Spider
Aspect of the Spider spell now allows you to climb walls
Casting Aspect of the Spider and striking an enemy grants a 50% chance to poison them for 3sec
item.traveloptics.spectral_spell_slot_up: Can be crafted or found rarely inside Forlorn Ruins chests.
item.traveloptics.spell_imbuing_curio.al: Cannot imbue the same echo with another spell!
item.traveloptics.stellothorn.evo_one.ac: §e★ §f[Evo 1] Just before returning, the scythe explodes in a §b6.0-block§f radius, dealing §b50%§f of its base damage
item.traveloptics.stellothorn.evo_one.in: §7☆ [Evo 1] Just before returning, the scythe explodes in a §36.0-block§7 radius, dealing §350%§7 of its base damage
§e★ §f[Evo 3] The clone's damage now scales with §bEldritch Spell Power
§7☆ [Evo 3] The clone's damage now scales with §3Eldritch Spell Power
item.traveloptics.stellothorn.evo_two.ac: §e★ §f[Evo 2] If the scythe hits any target before returning, the owner is healed for §b15%§f of their max health.
item.traveloptics.stellothorn.evo_two.in: §7☆ [Evo 2] If the scythe hits any target before returning, the owner is healed for §315%§7 of their max health.
item.traveloptics.stellothorn.guide: Is Obtained by defeating The Nightwarden
item.traveloptics.stellothorn.tooltip1: §fHold right-click to throw the scythe forward. It damages all enemies it passes through and returns automatically after §b0.75 seconds§f. On striking the first enemy, it spawns a clone §b8 blocks§f above their head, which drops down and deals additional damage in a §b3.5-block§f radius and applies Abyssal Fear.
item.traveloptics.supernova_staff.toolti: Summon a collapsing star that builds in intensity over time. After a short delay, it erupts in a massive Supernova explosion, dealing heavy damage and giving birth to a Supermassive Black Hole. The black hole pulls in nearby entities and continues to deal damage within its radius
item.traveloptics.tectonic_crest_armor.t: When wearing the full set, each time the wearer is hit, it triggers a shockwave that knocks back nearby entities, deals damage in a §b5-block §fradius, and sets them on fire. The damage is scaled by Fire spell power. §fThe wearer also gains fire resistance. Can only occur once every §c20sec. §fLong-cast armor imbued spells will be interrupted when armor is on cooldown, imbue with an instant-cast spell.
item.traveloptics.tectonic_ingot.guide: Can be crafted using Luxtructosaurus' drops.
item.traveloptics.the_accused_codex.guid: Can only be obtained by defeating Maledictus.
item.traveloptics.the_obliterator.evo_on: §e★ §f[Evo 1] §bOblivion Ray §fcan now be triggered with only one weapon equipped
§7☆ [Evo 1] §3Oblivion Ray §7can now be triggered with only one weapon equipped
item.traveloptics.the_obliterator.evo_th: §e★ §f[Evo 3] Abyss Blast Portals' damage now scales with §bEnder Spell Power
§7☆ [Evo 3] Abyss Blast Portals' damage now scales with §3Ender Spell Power
item.traveloptics.the_obliterator.evo_tw: §e★ §f[Evo 2] Summons §b4 §fAbyss Blast Portals around the caster instead of a single portal in front
§7☆ [Evo 2] Summons §34 §7Abyss Blast Portals around the caster instead of a single portal in front
item.traveloptics.the_obliterator.guide: Can be obtained by fusing Abyssal Tidecaller and The Annihilator in a Fusion Anvil.
item.traveloptics.the_obliterator.toolti: §fNormal attacks have §b45% §fchance to inflict Abyssal Curse II on enemies, dealing damage-over-time for §b5sec. §fHas higher §bCritical Damage §fagainst targets affected with Abyssal Curse.

§fHold §bright-click §ffor §b2sec §fwhile wielding the weapon in both hands to conjure an §bAbyss Blast Portal §fin front. The portal unleashes a searing laser, obliterating anything in its line of fire
§fHold §bright-click §ffor §b2sec §fto conjure an §bAbyss Blast Portal §fin front. The portals unleash searing lasers, obliterating anything in their line of fire
§fHold §bright-click §ffor §b2sec §fto conjure §b4 Abyss Blast Portals §faround you. The portals unleash searing lasers, obliterating anything in their line of fire
item.traveloptics.thorns_of_oblivion.gui: Craft using Scourge of the Sands and Shellbound in a Mechanical Fusion Anvil.
item.traveloptics.titanlord_scepter.guid: Right-click a tamed baby Tremorzilla with a Tremor Core. Ensure the Tremorzilla is tamed by the same owner to receive the reward.
item.traveloptics.titanlord_scepter_retr: Craft it from Titanlord Scepter using a crafting table. Check JEI for recipes.
item.traveloptics.titanlord_scepter_tect: Craft it from Titanlord Scepter using a crafting table. Check JEI for recipes.
Obtain this by defeating Amethyst Crabs.
item.traveloptics.tremor_core.desc: Interact with a tamed baby Tremorzilla to get Titanlord Scepter
item.traveloptics.tremor_core.guide: Found rarely in toxic caves or by defeating Tremorzilla.
item.traveloptics.trident_of_the_eternal: §e★ §f[Evo 1] Tidal Torment's area damage is increased by §b+25%
§7☆ [Evo 1] Tidal Torment's area damage is increased by §3+25%
§e★ §f[Evo 3] Boltstrike damage scales with §bAqua Spell Power
§7☆ [Evo 3] Boltstrike damage scales with §3Aqua Spell Power

§e★ §f[Evo 2] Tidal Slash now applies an effect for §b5sec§f. During this time, normal attacks unleash §bFlood Slash§f projectiles, but overall effectiveness is reduced by §c50%§f, up to §b4 - 6 slashes

§7☆ [Evo 2] Tidal Slash now applies an effect for §35sec§7. During this time, normal attacks unleash §3Flood Slash§7 projectiles, but overall effectiveness is reduced by §450%§7, up to §34 - 6 slashes

When thrown, striking an enemy deals increased direct damage. Upon hitting the ground, it creates a §bMaelstrom§f, pulling in nearby foes, striking them with §bBoltstrike§f, and inflicting §bTidal Torment§f. Attacking an enemy afflicted by Tidal Torment causes all nearby afflicted foes to take §b50%§f of the damage dealt.

When thrown, striking an enemy deals increased direct damage. Upon hitting the ground, it creates a §bMaelstrom§f, pulling in nearby foes, striking them with §bBoltstrike§f, and inflicting §bTidal Torment§f. Attacking an enemy afflicted by Tidal Torment causes all nearby afflicted foes to take §b75%§f of the damage dealt.

When thrown, striking an enemy deals increased direct damage. Upon hitting the ground, it creates a §bMaelstrom§f, pulling in nearby foes, striking them with §bBoltstrike§f, and inflicting §bTidal Torment§f. Attacking an enemy afflicted by Tidal Torment causes all nearby afflicted foes to take §b75%§f of the damage dealt.

When thrown, striking an enemy deals increased direct damage. Upon hitting the ground, it creates a §bMaelstrom§f, pulling in nearby foes, striking them with §bBoltstrike§f, and inflicting §bTidal Torment§f. Attacking an enemy afflicted by Tidal Torment causes all nearby afflicted foes to take §b75%§f of the damage dealt.
item.traveloptics.verdant_spellweave_ing: Can be found by slaying Amethyst Crabs.
item.traveloptics.void_manuscript.guide: Can be obtained by slaying Void Tomes
item.traveloptics.void_manuscript.guide2: Mainly used as a trading material for Fading Mage. Fading Mage doesn't accept emeralds as a currency, they use Void Manuscripts instead.
Can be found by defeating Ender Guardian.
item.traveloptics.void_tome_spawn_egg.gu: Void Tome spawns in Void Cathedral structure. Structure can be found in End dimension.
item.traveloptics.voidstrike_reaper.guid: This weapon is dropped by Ender Guardian.
item.traveloptics.wings.firework_warning: Fireworks disabled when using exalted wings!
item.traveloptics.withered_excrucis.guid: Can be obtained from defeating The Nightwarden
rarity.traveloptics:abyssal.name: Abyssal
rarity.traveloptics:amethyst.name: Amethyst
rarity.traveloptics:ancient.name: Ancient
rarity.traveloptics:aquatic.name: Aquatic
rarity.traveloptics:cursed.name: Cursed
rarity.traveloptics:eldritch.name: Eldritch
rarity.traveloptics:ignis.name: Ignis
rarity.traveloptics:legendary.name: Legendary
rarity.traveloptics:mechanized.name: Mechanized
rarity.traveloptics:monstrous.name: Monstrous
rarity.traveloptics:mythic.name: Mythic
rarity.traveloptics:natural.name: Natural
rarity.traveloptics:primordial.name: Primordial
rarity.traveloptics:retro.name: Retro
rarity.traveloptics:signature.name: Signature
rarity.traveloptics:tectonic.name: Tectonic
rarity.traveloptics:toxic.name: Toxic
rarity.traveloptics:void.name: Void
spell.traveloptics.abyssal_blast.guide: Cast to fire a devastating beam of abyssal energy in a straight line. While active, caster cannot move or look around. Can only be found by defeating The Leviathan.
spell.traveloptics.aerial_collapse.guide: Inflict an effect that lifts enemies into the air for 2.5 seconds before crushing them down to the floor, dealing percentage-based damage to their health. The damage dealt ignores any kind of damage cap.
spell.traveloptics.aerial_collapse.imbue: This spell cannot be cast from Imbuements (Use Spellbook)
spell.traveloptics.annihilation.guide: Targets enemies and nukes them with a devastating spell that deals massive damage. Survivors are inflicted with a radiation effect, preventing incoming healing. Can only be  found from Toxic Caves ruins and by slaying Nucleepers.
spell.traveloptics.aqua_missiles.guide: Fires a rapid succession of water bolts that deal damage and home in on nearby entities.
spell.traveloptics.ashen_breath.guide: Exhale a cloud of darkening ash, damaging and blinding creatures in its reach.
spell.traveloptics.astral_sense.guide: Reveals the pathfinder of nearby entities in a radius. Normal casting alerts the caster about nearby threats, while crouch casting helps sense loot, traps, and valuables like Arcane Debris.
spell.traveloptics.axe_of_the_doomed.gui: Summon a Aptrgangr to fight by your side and unleash devastating melee attacks upon your enemies. Can only be obtained by defeating Aptrgangr.
spell.traveloptics.berserker.guide: Grants the Berserk effect to the caster, providing an immense boost to critical hit rate and damage, but also inflicting the darkness effect on the caster.
spell.traveloptics.blackout.guide: Creates a lingering anti-magic field that suppresses abilities within its radius. Players caught in the zone are unable to cast spells and use items. Moving within the field inflicts small damage. Can only be obtained by defeating the Enraged Dead King.
spell.traveloptics.blink.guide: Low-cost, short-ranged teleport in the direction you're moving. Works omni-directionally.
spell.traveloptics.blood_howl.guide: Cast to shoot wither howitzer projectiles at your target. This spell has recasts.
spell.traveloptics.bubble_spray.guide: Sprays a stream of bubbles that deals damage, slows affected entities, and applies the Wet effect.
spell.traveloptics.burning_judgment.guid: Creates Ignis flame strikes on the ground in a straight line for a duration. If the caster's health falls below 50%, the strikes transform into soul-fired flame strikes. Can only be obtained by defeating Ignis.
spell.traveloptics.call_forth_the_dead_k: Summons an Enraged Dead King boss to challenge you. Defeating it grants a higher chance of obtaining high-quality loot, including the exclusive spell Blackout. The Enraged Dead King can cast additional powerful spells. The high mana cost is intentional to make it only cast-able from scrolls. Can only be found in Catacombs Chests.
spell.traveloptics.conjure_void_tomes.gu: Summon magical Void Tomes to fight by your side and unleash spell attacks upon your enemies. Can be found in Void Cathedral.
spell.traveloptics.coral_barrage.guide: Cast to mark targets, unleashing a barrage of coral bolts at the end of recasting. Bolts damage, pierce, and shatter into shrapnel, dealing AoE damage within a 2-block radius.
spell.traveloptics.cursed_blast.guide: Channel the essence of darkness, unleashing a cryogenic blast that shatters the resolve of those caught within. Amplified by absorbed soul fragments. Only cast-able from Cursed Wraithblade.
spell.traveloptics.cursed_blast.warning: You need Cursed Wraithblade to cast this spell!
spell.traveloptics.cursed_minefield.guid: On cast, summons Leviathan’s abyssal mines in a radius around the player. The mine placement is random, but they cannot go below the caster’s Y level.
spell.traveloptics.cursed_revenants.guid: Cast to summon random Draugr variants that'll protect you and fight for you.
spell.traveloptics.death_laser.guide: Cast to shoot The Harbinger Laser beam in a straight line. While active, caster cannot move or look around.
spell.traveloptics.despair.guide: Launches a magical Axe Blade forward on the look direction piercing through entities in its path. Deals damage to all caught in its trajectory.
spell.traveloptics.earthshatter.guide: Grants a effect; during that, Right-clicking or holding the ground will raise block that can be shoot by attacking it.
spell.traveloptics.echo_of_the_abyss.gui: Summons a Hullbreaker to fight and protect the caster. Can be used as an underwater mount, granting water breathing while ridden. Can only be obtained from defeating Hullbreaker.
spell.traveloptics.eek.guide: Eek yourself and eek targeted entity.
spell.traveloptics.em_pulse.guide: Cast to stun nearby entities for a short duration. Stunned enemies has a visual indicator.
spell.traveloptics.eternal_sentinel.guid: Conjure a friendly Ender Golem to protect and fight by your side. Can only be obtained by defeating Ender Golem.
spell.traveloptics.extinction.guide: Calls down a massive asteroid, smashing into the ground with incredible force. The impact devastates a large area, leaving a crater that erupts with searing heat, turning all within to ash. Only cast-able from Gauntlet Of Extinction.
spell.traveloptics.flood_slash.guide: Unleashes a aqua-infused slash projectile that deals damage and converts damage dealt into Mana for the caster. Hitting multiple entities increases the caster's Mana regeneration temporarily.
spell.traveloptics.floodgate.guide: Imposes a damage cap on the caster, ensuring that any incoming damage exceeding the threshold is reduced to the cap. When damage surpasses the threshold, waves surge outward in all directions, dealing damage.
spell.traveloptics.gyro_slash.guide: Transform the Infernal Devastator into Blade Mode, slashing entities in front of you. Using an Infernal Devastator Evo 2 or higher creates a slash projectile that pulls in nearby entities with a fiery vacuum effect before bursting into flame jets. Only cast-able from Infernal Devastator.
spell.traveloptics.gyro_slash.warning: You need Infernal Devastator to cast Gyro Slash!
spell.traveloptics.halberd_horizon.guide: Summons Phantom Halberds in the battlefield around the caster, damaging entities caught in it. Can only be obtained by defeating Maledictus.
spell.traveloptics.hydroshot.guide: Fires a small water bolt that deals damage, slows enemies, and applies the wet effect.
spell.traveloptics.ignited_onslaught.gui: Cast to summon a Ignited Revenant & Berserker to protect you and fight for you. Can only be obtained by defeating Ignited Revenant and Ignited Berserker.
spell.traveloptics.jet_steam.guide: Generates a powerful surge that propels the caster at high speed while using elytra or swimming underwater, granting temporary water breathing.
spell.traveloptics.jet_steam.warning: You must be swimming or in elytra flight to cast this spell!
spell.traveloptics.lava_bomb.guide: Launches projectiles at a 45° angle in front of the caster, that explodes upon impact, creating lava pools. When cast, the spell absorbs nearby lava.
spell.traveloptics.lingering_strain.guid: Grants a effect; During that any burst damage you get will be split into 4 different smaller damage and will be dealt over time giving the caster time to recover.
Cast to deploy a Magnetron that will follow, protect, and fight for you. Can only be obtained by defeating Magnetron.
spell.traveloptics.mechanized_predator.g: Cast to deploy Watchers and The Prowler that will follow, protect, and fight for you. Can only be obtained by defeating The Watcher and The Prowler.
⚠ A tripwire trap is attached nearby!
spell.traveloptics.meteor_storm.guide: Summons Ignis fireballs to rain down from the sky. If the caster's health falls below 50%, the fireballs transform into soul-fired projectiles.
spell.traveloptics.nocturnal_swarm.guide: Cast to summon deadly swarm of Vesper.
spell.traveloptics.not_in_water.warning: You must be underwater to cast this spell!
spell.traveloptics.nullflare.guide: Cast to inflict Nullflare Ice on enemies, or Crouch Cast to inflict Nullflare Fire; when Ice meets Fire, or vice versa, it triggers a Nullflare Blast, dealing damage. Additional effect stacks increase the Blast damage.
spell.traveloptics.orbital_void.guide: Shoots Abyssal Orb projectiles in a circular pattern around the player, damaging entities. On the initial cast, Abyssal Orbs home in on nearby entities.
spell.traveloptics.primal_pack.guide: Summon Vallumraptors and Tremorsaurus to fight by your side. Can only be obtained by defeating Vallumraptors and Tremorsaurus.
spell.traveloptics.primordial_steed.guid: Summon a Atlatitan that will follow you around, let you ride. Also protect, and fight for you. Can only be obtained by defeating Luxtructosaurus.
spell.traveloptics.psychic_bolt.guide: Select multiple targets on cast. On recast end, fires small projectiles that confuse targets on hit, making them prioritize attacking nearby non-player entities.
spell.traveloptics.rainfall.guide: Calls down a rainstorm that grants immunity to negative effects for the caster and applies the Wet effect to everyone within.
spell.traveloptics.rapid_laser.guide: Continuously shoots Harbinger's pew-pew laser to targeted entities.
spell.traveloptics.reversal.guide: Reverses any incoming damage with increased power. Additionally, it can copy incoming projectiles.
spell.traveloptics.reversal.warning: You need a suitable weapon to cast Reversal!
spell.traveloptics.shadowed_miasma.guide: Inflicts nearby enemies with the abyssal curse effect and infuses your weapon with the same curse. Dealing damage to an enemy during the effect has a chance to spread the effect to nearby enemies.
spell.traveloptics.shear_of_the_stars.gu: Summons a dragon spirit that flies forward, passing through blocks and damaging enemies it hits. It leaves behind a stellar trail that deals damage over time to nearby enemies. Requires Stellothorn to cast this spell.
spell.traveloptics.shear_of_the_stars.wa: You need Stellothorn to cast this spell!
spell.traveloptics.solar_flare.guide: Grants an effect that continuously summons Umvuthi sunstrikes on enemies around the caster.
spell.traveloptics.spectral_blink.guide: After activation, the caster has 3 seconds. During this time, they can teleport to any entity they are looking at, even through walls. Any entities within the teleportation range will be revealed to the caster.
spell.traveloptics.stele_cascade.guide: Summons Ancient Desert Stele in a radius, crashing down and dealing damage.
spell.traveloptics.sticky_steed_summon.g: Conjure a Gum Worm that will follow you around, let you ride. Also protect, and fight for you. Can only be obtained by defeating Gum Worm.
spell.traveloptics.summon_desert_dweller: Summon Koboletons and Wadjet to fight by your side. Can only be obtained by defeating Koboletons and Wadjet.
spell.traveloptics.summon_group.warning: You already have a Group summon active!
spell.traveloptics.summon_kaiju.warning: You already have an active Kaiju summon!
spell.traveloptics.summon_miniboss.warni: A Miniboss summon is already active!
spell.traveloptics.sunbeam.guide: Fires an Umvuthi sunbeam in a straight line, damaging and igniting enemies in its path. The beam follows the caster’s LOS.
spell.traveloptics.supernova.guide: Summon a collapsing star that builds in intensity over time. After a short delay, it erupts in a massive explosion, dealing heavy damage and gives birth to a supermassive black hole. The black hole pulls in nearby entities and continues to deal damage within its radius. Requires Wand of Final Light to cast this spell.
spell.traveloptics.supernova.warning: Requires Wand Of Final Light to cast this spell!
spell.traveloptics.sword_of_the_ancients: Summon kobolediator to fight by your side and unleash devastating melee attacks upon your enemies. Can only be obtained by defeating Kobolediator.
spell.traveloptics.tectonic_rift.warning: You need Gauntlet Of Extinction to cast this spell!
spell.traveloptics.the_forgotten_beast.g: Summon Forsaken, a powerful, rideable creature that fight alongside you. However, beware: its will is not fully tameable, and its ferocity may prove unpredictable. Can only be obtained by defeating Forsaken.
spell.traveloptics.tidal_grasp.guide: Pulls a targeted entity toward the caster, striking them with force to deal damage while applying a Stun and the Wet effect.
spell.traveloptics.tidal_slash.guide: Unleashes a Flood Slash projectile that travels forward, dealing damage and restoring mana to the caster. When wielding the Trident of the Eternal Maelstrom (Evo 2 or 3), normal attacks generate multiple weaker slashes that deal reduced damage and restore less mana. Requires Trident Of The Eternal Maelstrom to cast this spell.
spell.traveloptics.tidal_slash.warning: Requires Trident Of The Eternal Maelstrom to cast this spell!
spell.traveloptics.tsunami.guide: Call forth an unstoppable tide that surges forward, slamming into enemies, dealing damage, sweeping them away, and applying wet effect.
spell.traveloptics.vigor_siphon.guide: Cast to connect with your nearest summon. Damage dealt by the summon heals you, and your damage heals the summon in return. If you die while tethered, the linked summon is sacrificed to restore you with 8hp
spell.traveloptics.violent_skreech.guide: Continuously pulsate sound blast to Shred Armor, Damage Nearby enemies and Applying Chilled effect. 2% of damage deal converted into lifesteal.
spell.traveloptics.void_devourer.guide: Creates a Dimensional Rift that pulls everything around it and damages enemies caught in it.
spell.traveloptics.void_eruption.guide: Shoots Void Howitzer Projectiles that explode and summon void runes in a radius. This spell can be recast.
spell.traveloptics.vortex_of_the_deep.gu: Conjures a massive water vortex that pulls entities toward its center, slowing them and applying Wet effect. The vortex periodically discharges Boltstrikes to devastate those within it's radius.
spell.traveloptics.vortex_punch.guide: Create a Void Vortex, pulling enemies in. Teleport into it and unleash a crushing uppercut, dealing damage and sending foes flying upward.
ui.traveloptics.annihilation_note: Now only crouch cast to destroy blocks
ui.traveloptics.call_forth_the_dead_king: Cast this spell directly from its scroll
ui.traveloptics.flame_jet.requirement: Requires Infernal Devastator Evo 2 or above to trigger Flame Jet damage
ui.traveloptics.nullflare.additional: Spell's damage is further enhanced by Ice and Fire spell power.
ui.traveloptics.tidal_slash_extras: When wielding the Trident of the Eternal Maelstrom (Evo 2 or 3), normal attacks generate multiple weaker slashes that deal reduced damage and restore less mana
ui.traveloptics.vigor_siphon_quirk: If owner dies, sacrifice the tethered summon to keep owner alive and heal them
